page.title: 17CRAVEN AREA NEWS 14.6.85
page.content: On{Friday June 14th 1985}the local newspaper, the{Craven Herald and {Pioneer}published these items of local interest:First our schools{Summer {Fayre}and also a{Car Boot}sale at the local Secondary school.There was also a advert for entertainment at{Long {Ashes Inn.}At the{Old Hall Inn}the {R.S.P.C.A}were to hold a{Garden Party on{June 22nd 1985.}Another item of local interest was a report of a {Wharfedale v Riddlesden}Cricket match with{Riddlesden}winning!! The biggest item of local news was about a{28 year old Yorkshire rugby {player}who is also a P.E teacher at {Ermysteds Grammar School, Skipton.}He had played in both internationals against{New Zealand}on the recent {British Lions}tour.Finally a world class climber was found dead at the bottom of{Malham Cove.
